title: Echoes and Butterflies
description: Everyone knows that feeling. You know, when you've turned four or five pages of a book, only to realise you’ve got no idea what’s going on.That's what Susan was realising about her LIFE! How many years of her personal life had quietly passed by while she’d had her head buried in her career? How long had it been since she had been out to dinner with friends, or made a friend? Did she even have any friends other than Michael?She’d once been a strong advocate in the gay and lesbian community. Where did that fire for equality and justice go? That drive to make the world a better place?And dating? She didn’t even want to think about how long it had been since she had a date.Well, you can sit around moaning about your life, or you can fix it. How hard could it be for a successful, forty-something lesbian executive to find love? Easy, right?Contains some sexually explicit material.
author: Roxann Pattison
